hero.headline: I BUILD LIKE I GIVE A DAMN.
hero.subhead: The bridge between messy MVPs and scaled systems.

activeProject.title: Right Click Save (RCS 2.0)
bullets: Leading the rebuild of the world's premier digital art publication.
Bridging editorial vision with blockchain execution (Wallet Auth, Token Gating).
Mapped 100% of design-to-dev user stories to unblock MVP launch.

ventures.title: WriteClique
bullets: Moving authors from 'Messy Draft' to 'Flawless Fiction' using custom LLM pipelines.
Architected the 'Prompt Chain' logic for plot consistency.
Built P2P marketplace from 0 to Acquisition.
Scaled to $100k+ MRR and 17,000+ listings.
Managed 40+ daily orders and physical logistics.
Owned FarmCare/FarmGo apps for global agri-giant.
Launched in SE Asia & Africa, serving millions of farmers.
Led daily deployment decisions for scalable implementation.
Built neo-banking stack for India's largest private bank.
Architected system for 1 Million Transactions/Sec.
Ensured 100% RBI compliance for KYC and Payments.
Architected POS & Inventory system for African SMBs.
Scaled to 1,000+ stores with offline-first sync.
Integrated Bluetooth printers and local payment gateways.
Designed GPT-4 prompt logic for journaling.
Balanced mental health nuances with retention loops.
Created viral loops using data-driven psychology.
